channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- HP ArcSight ESM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- HP ArcSight ESM

item.title: CVE-2017-14357|2024-09-17T03:12:31.982Z -- micro%20focus -- hp%20arcsight%20esm
item.description: A Reflected and Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in HP ArcSight ESM and HP ArcSight ESM Express, in any 6.x version prior to 6.9.1c Patch 4 or 6.11.0 Patch 1. This vulnerability could be exploited remotely to allow Reflected and Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
